sqlMap.statement: SELECT EAISEVRINSTNCNAME AS "EAISVRINSTNM", EAISEVRIP AS "EAISVRIP" , SEVRLSNPORTNAME AS "EAISVRLSNPORT", FLOVRSEVRNAME AS "FAILOVERSVRNM", HOSTNAME AS "HOSTNAME" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAISY02 WHERE EAISEVRINSTNCNAME != 'ALL' AND EAISEVRIP != '*' ORDER BY EAISEVRIP, SEVRLSNPORTNAME ASC
SELECT HOSTNAME AS "HOSTNAME", EAISEVRIP AS "EAISVRIP" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAISY02 WHERE EAISEVRINSTNCNAME != 'ALL' AND EAISEVRIP != '*' GROUP BY HOSTNAME, EAISEVRIP ORDER BY HOSTNAME ASC
SELECT SNAADPTRSEVRNAME AS "HOSTNAME", SNAADPTRSEVRIPNAME AS "EAISVRIP" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIAD13 ORDER BY SNAADPTRSEVRNAME ASC
